headline.main: In The Nation; A Main Principle to Which Russia Subscribed

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 1 -- The hopeful prospect opened to all "sovereign peace-loving states" by the Four-Power Declaration and corollary proclamations of the Moscow Conference is so vast that only small areas can be closely surveyed at a time. Each of these is of supreme importance, and each will be the subject of millions of words and the locus of numerous events during the war and thereafter.
